exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type P : code n : nat l, r : list X Unable to unify "?M1446 = ?M1447" with "let (i, li) := P in let (n, code) := (n, l) in exists l r : list X, code = l ++ li ++ r /\\ i = n + length l".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
P: code
n: nat
r: list X
l: list X

Goal:
P <sc (n, l) -> P <sc (n, l ++ r)

Premises:
code = (nat * list X)%type : Type
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
subcode_left : forall (n m : nat) (l r : list X), n = m -> (n, l) <sc (m, l ++ r)
subcode_right : forall (n m : nat) (l r : list X), n = m + length l -> (n, r) <sc (m, l ++ r)
subcode = fun P (Q : nat * list X) => let (i, li) := P in let (n, code) := Q in exists l r : list X, code = l ++ li ++ r /\ i = n + length l : code -> nat * list X -> Prop Arguments subcode _ _ /
subcode_trans : forall P (Q R : nat * list X), P <sc Q -> Q <sc R -> P <sc R
subcode_start_in_code : forall P (Q : nat * list X), 0 < code_length P -> P <sc Q -> in_code (code_start P) Q
subcode_in_code : forall P (Q : nat * list X) (i : nat), P <sc Q -> in_code i P -> in_code i Q
subcode_out_code : forall P (Q : nat * list X) (i : nat), P <sc Q -> out_code i Q -> out_code i P
subcode_length : forall P (Q : nat * list X), P <sc Q -> code_start Q <= code_start P /\ code_end P <= code_end Q
subcode_cons_inj : forall (i : nat) (ρ δ : X) P, (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> (i, δ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ = δ
subcode_length' : forall P (Q : nat * list X), P <sc Q -> length (snd P) <= length (snd Q)
subcode_refl : forall P, P <sc P
subcode_length_le : forall P (Q : nat * list X), P <sc Q -> fst Q <= fst P /\ fst P + length (snd P) <= fst Q + length (snd Q)
app_assoc_reverse : forall (A : Type) (l m n : list A), (l ++ m) ++ n = l ++ m ++ n
BinPos.Pos.SqrtSpec_ind : forall P : BinNums.positive * BinPos.Pos.mask -> BinNums.positive -> Prop, (forall s x : BinNums.positive, x = BinPos.Pos.mul s s -> P (s, BinPos.Pos.IsNul) x) -> (forall s r x : BinNums.positive, x = BinPos.Pos.add (BinPos.Pos.mul s s) r -> BinPos.Pos.le r (BinNums.xO s) -> P (s, BinPos.Pos.IsPos r) x) -> forall (p : BinNums.positive * BinPos.Pos.mask) (p0 : BinNums.positive), BinPos.Pos.SqrtSpec p p0 -> P p p0
BinPos.Pos.SqrtSpec_sind : forall P : BinNums.positive * BinPos.Pos.mask -> BinNums.positive -> SProp, (forall s x : BinNums.positive, x = BinPos.Pos.mul s s -> P (s, BinPos.Pos.IsNul) x) -> (forall s r x : BinNums.positive, x = BinPos.Pos.add (BinPos.Pos.mul s s) r -> BinPos.Pos.le r (BinNums.xO s) -> P (s, BinPos.Pos.IsPos r) x) -> forall (p : BinNums.positive * BinPos.Pos.mask) (p0 : BinNums.positive), BinPos.Pos.SqrtSpec p p0 -> P p p0
app_nil_end : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l = l ++ nil
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (vw : VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v w where ?A : [X : Type P : code n : nat l : list X r : list X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type P : code n : nat l : list X r : list X |- nat] ?m : [X : Type P : code n : nat l : list X r : list X |- nat]
ZMicromega.max_var_nformalae_correct : forall (l : list (EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1)) (p : EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z) (o : RingMicromega.Op1) (v : BinNums.positive), In (p, o) l -> In v (ZMicromega.vars BinNums.xH p) -> BinPos.Pos.le v (ZMicromega.max_var_nformulae l)
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (a : ?A), VectorDef.cons ?A a (?n + ?m) (VectorDef.append v w) = VectorDef.append (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v) w where ?A : [X : Type P : code n : nat l : list X r : list X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type P : code n : nat l : list X r : list X |- nat] ?m : [X : Type P : code n : nat l : list X r : list X |- nat]
partition_cons2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (a : A) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> f a = false -> partition f (a :: l) = (l1, a :: l2)
partition_cons1 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (a : A) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> f a = true -> partition f (a :: l) = (a :: l1, l2)
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [X : Type P : code n : nat l : list X r : list X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type P : code n : nat l : list X r : list X |- nat]
ZifyClasses.rew_iff : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> P -> Q
BinPos.Pos.max_case_strong : forall (n m : BinNums.positive) (P : BinNums.positive -> Type), (BinPos.Pos.le m n -> P n) -> (BinPos.Pos.le n m -> P m) -> P (BinPos.Pos.max n m)
VectorDef.splitat : forall l0 r0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (l0 + r0) -> VectorDef.t ?A l0 * VectorDef.t ?A r0 where ?A : [X : Type P : code n : nat l : list X r : list X |- Type]
app_length : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), length (l ++ l') = length l + length l'
in_code = fun (i : nat) P => code_start P <= i < code_end P : nat -> code -> Prop Arguments in_code _%nat_scope _ /
in_out_code : forall (i : nat) P, in_code i P -> out_code i P -> False
out_code = fun (i : nat) P => i < code_start P \/ code_end P <= i : nat -> code -> Prop Arguments out_code _%nat_scope _ /
list_app_inj : forall (X : Type) (l1 l2 r1 r2 : list X), length l1 = length l2 -> l1 ++ r1 = l2 ++ r2 -> l1 = l2 /\ r1 = r2
code_start = fun P => fst P : code -> nat Arguments code_start _ /
VectorDef.t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
code_end = fun P => fst P + length (snd P) : code -> nat Arguments code_end _ /
measure_rect2 : forall (X Y : Type) (m : X -> Y -> nat) (P : X -> Y -> Type), (forall (x : X) (y : Y), (forall (x' : X) (y' : Y), m x' y' < m x y -> P x' y') -> P x y) -> forall (x : X) (y : Y), P x y
measure_rect3 : forall (X Y Z : Type) (m : X -> Y -> Z -> nat) (P : X -> Y -> Z -> Type), (forall (x : X) (y : Y) (z : Z), (forall (x' : X) (y' : Y) (z' : Z), m x' y' z' < m x y z -> P x' y' z') -> P x y z) -> forall (x : X) (y : Y) (z : Z), P x y z
Relation_Operators.symprod_sind : forall (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) (P : A * B -> A * B -> SProp), (forall x x' : A, leA x x' -> forall y : B, P (x, y) (x', y)) -> (forall y y' : B, leB y y' -> forall x : A, P (x, y) (x, y')) -> forall p p0 : A * B, Relation_Operators.symprod A B leA leB p p0 -> P p p0
Relation_Operators.symprod_ind : forall (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) (P : A * B -> A * B -> Prop), (forall x x' : A, leA x x' -> forall y : B, P (x, y) (x', y)) -> (forall y y' : B, leB y y' -> forall x : A, P (x, y) (x, y')) -> forall p p0 : A * B, Relation_Operators.symprod A B leA leB p p0 -> P p p0
Relation_Operators.swapprod_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : A * A -> A * A -> Prop), (forall (x y : A) (p : A * A), Relation_Operators.symprod A A R R (x, y) p -> P (x, y) p) -> (forall (x y : A) (p : A * A), Relation_Operators.symprod A A R R (x, y) p -> P (y, x) p) -> forall p p0 : A * A, Relation_Operators.swapprod A R p p0 -> P p p0
Relation_Operators.swapprod_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : A * A -> A * A -> SProp), (forall (x y : A) (p : A * A), Relation_Operators.symprod A A R R (x, y) p -> P (x, y) p) -> (forall (x y : A) (p : A * A), Relation_Operators.symprod A A R R (x, y) p -> P (y, x) p) -> forall p p0 : A * A, Relation_Operators.swapprod A R p p0 -> P p p0
combine_split : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B), length l = length l' -> split (combine l l') = (l, l')
